resources.string:
Added timout setting to stop alert notification after too much time has expired.
 From: (filter) setting - multiple address can be separated by new lines as well as with commas.
 
 New Locations:
 Tuolumne County, CA
 Memorial Star, CO
 Seminole County, FL
 DuPage County, IL (alt)
 Iroquois County, IL
 Lawrence County, MO
 Grafton County, NH
 Rensselaer County, NY
 Warren County, NY
 Flight Vector, TX
 Royse City, TX
 University of Virginia, VA
 Fayette County, WV
 
 Location Parsing Fixes:
 Lake County, CA
 Teller County, CO
 Kankakee County, IL
 Jefferson Parish, LA
 Carroll County, MD
 Sussex County, NJ
 Chautauqua County, NY
 Erie County, PA
 Galveson County, TX
 Loudoun County, VA
 Yakima County, WA
 
 Mid Island Region, BC
 
 Misc fixes:
 Problem with screen turning off immediately after alert received.
